title: Why i love the Riot design team.
body:
I hope the Reds see this. I want 'em to know im grateful.

UPCOMING: Nightmare {{champion:23}} . This skin makes Trynd look like something straight out of Dark Souls or Resident Evil. I absolutely love it.

Master Arcanist {{champion:115}} Riot took a crazy-ass bomber and made him a crazy-ass bomber _wizard_. 10/10.

PROJECT: {{champion:157}} Words cannot describe how much i love this skin

Guard of the Sands {{champion:121}} This skin just goes TOO WELL with his design. Kudos, Riot.

SSW {{champion:412}} and {{champion:29}} Both of them (and the rest of the SSW skins) look absolutely awesome, plus the reference of Imp's "field day". _ba dum tssss_

All the Surprise Party skins. Because PARTY

Elderwood {{champion:432}}  The essence of it just goes along so well with the basis of what he does, i actually would have preferred this as his basic skin.

Warden/Maruader skins. Knights vs. Bandits, could not have been designed better

Battlecast {{champion:96}}  The Battlecast line has proceeded well.

{{champion:18}} Rework. I know, this isnt really a skin, but the new design was just so appealing to the eyes when it was first revealed.

There are MANY more to add, but i'm gonna give my typing fingers a break. Ty so much, Riot Design Team.
